1528558109_1JqrogiDCFGRVVrCdxwP93wurKDSg.body: Use YunoHost (https://yunohost.org). It makes easy to host your mail server,xmpp, single account. You can install apps like wordpress,peertube,mastodon,nextcloud,etc(there are lot more, see the complete list here https://yunohost.org/#/apps). If you want to learn to host your own server, then also YunoHost is better way to learn and experiment.
And I forget to tell that YunoHost have zeronet package too.
